title: Cannot login to client
body:
It works fine on the lol site, I have not changed my password or anything, I just cannot login in, I have unchecked caps and tried all I could username is right, pass is right. I have no idea why this could be happening. It sucks too because I dced in the middle of a game and can't get back in. (thank god it was norms lol)

Edit: It worked, but I would still like an answer for why this could have happened

replies.body: Same here, i cant login too after dc
Just had it happen to me too. Couldn't sign into the client after a DC so I checked the website and everything was fine. Hope this gets some attention and they figure it out.

was joining a ranked game and it didnt load and it said i lost connection to server and then it closed my game. Reload the game says it reverted back to a older version of the client. Nows it telling me account and pw are wrong.

We've been seeing some people having this strange issue of being able to sign in here but not on the client. Most of the time simply closing and reopening the client gets you back in, but it's still rather odd for this type of thing to happen. 

Since you mentioned you were dc'd in that game, I want to also touch on that to see if we can stop that from happening in the future. Let's first check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is configured in the best way for League.
Im having the same problem but it didnt fix itself :/
happend to me as well except i was in ranked, i lost LP as well

Having the same issue, logged into the website but the game doesn't work.  Happened after a bug splat.  Honestly Riot, this is ridiculous, you are losing a 5 year player to HOTS because your client is terrible.  I have so many issues with this game and can play every blizzard game with zero issues.
